Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Given its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $150. I trust this price reflects the true value and benefits it will bring to you. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
